item.title: ClonerAlliance Flint D4P - Standalone Dual-4K Video Overlay Device and Audio Mixing Station.
item.description: 4K@60fps and 2K@144fps game overlay live streaming with multiple display modes using remote control. Capture and stream your gameplay/videos at 1080p@60fps instantly while enjoying recreational moments.
item.author: (How may I help you today?)

item.title: Always seek the leverage effect
item.description: Leverage effects allow us to have an impact far beyond our actual size. They are a multiplier of our results. The effort I invest is multiplied by the leverage effect and added to the result.

item.title: Markdown in Academic Writing – iA Writer: The Focused Writing App
item.description: A piece of writing aiming to be academic must be 'clear, concise, focused, structured and backed up by evidence'. We believe that Markdown writing tools make it easier to focus on content and thus support the main aim of academic writing. iA Writer has a couple of tricks up its sleeves that other apps do not.

item.title: Write The Blog You Want to Read — Philipp Trommler's Blog
item.description: It's been quiet around here, and that's for a reason. Blogging is just one thing on my to-do list, and it's pretty low on that list. But there's more to it. It's not just about making time to write something but also about staying motivated.
item.author: (Philipp Trommler)

item.title: Text Aesthetics: Command Line UI/UX
item.description: Beautifying and modernizing your command line experience. A tour of emulators, text options, and prompt styling.
item.author:
(By Michael Cordell
on January 2, 2022)

item.title: Redefining affordability
item.description: Ever wondered what it means for anyone to say they can afford something? I have learned we all have varying perceptions of affordability so I am writing this to talk about mine without trying to sway you from whatever yours may be.
item.author: (Joseph Rex)

item.title: Fixing stutters in Papers Please on Linux – Blog
item.description: Since I switched to Linux some time ago, I had my fair share of problems with running games on Linux. To be fair, most of these were not designed to run on linux, but the awesome Proton and its main project wine make it easy to run most games I am interested in seamlessly. Most of the time, games refuse to start, but some workaround exists to make it run.

item.title: Accurately Measure Elapsed Time (Execution Time) in C# .NET using Stopwatch Class | Pro Code Guide
item.description: Using Stopwatch accurately measure elapsed time (execution time) in C# .NET 6 code so that we are able to determine time taken by each operation of code.

item.title: Things you might not know about CSharp - Using Params with Indexers
item.description: In the first part of this series, we are going to take a look at a little known feature with index parameters. See how to pass multiple arguments to a custom indexer.
item.author: (Stuart Blackler)

item.title: Expression-bodied Members in C# - Code Maze
item.description: Expression-bodied members in C# let us define our methods and properties using a simplified and concise syntax that is extremely readable.

item.title: Go Fuzzing - The Go Programming Language
item.description: Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software.

item.title: Safing Portmaster
item.description: Safing is a software that protects your privacy online. It's so easy, anyone can use it.
